name: Exrain Prelude
description:
You have been condemned to hell for your sins, will you gain God's forgiveness or will you be doomed to an unfortunate fate...

Exrain Prelude is a simple 2D action arcade style game in which you are a monster with one simple task. Travel from room to room and kill everything you come across, from sentient devout christian teapots to self-feasting cannibals.

----------

Controls:

Move with W A S D

Attack with Arrow Keys

----------

Join the [Discord Server] to discuss and get quickly updated on news and updates on the game.
